file.name: Loan.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Loan
  description: This service domain handles the fulfillment of a general loan product. This includes the initial set-up of the loan facility and the completion of scheduled and ad-hoc product processing tasks
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/Loan/10.0.0
paths:
  /Loan/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - LoanFacility
      summary: InCR Initiate a loan
      description: InCR Initiate a loan
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateLoanFacilityRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateLoanFacilityResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - LoanFacility
      summary: UpCR Update details for an existing loan
      description: UpCR Update details for an existing loan
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateLoanFacilityRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateLoanFacilityResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - LoanFacility
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about a loan
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about a loan
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveLoanFacilityResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Interest/{interestId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Interest
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about interest applied to a loan
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about interest applied to a loan
      operationId: RetrieveInterest
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/InterestID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveInterestResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/ServiceFees/{servicefeesId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - ServiceFees
      summary: ExBQ Execute a fee charge against a loan
      description: ExBQ Execute a fee charge against a loan
      operationId: ExecuteServiceFees
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ServiceFeesID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ExecuteServiceFeesRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExecuteServiceFeesResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/ServiceFees/{servicefeesId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - ServiceFees
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan fees
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan fees
      operationId: RetrieveServiceFees
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ServiceFeesID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveServiceFeesResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Disbursement/{disbursementId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Disbursement
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a disbursement paid against a loan
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a disbursement paid against a loan
      operationId: RetrieveDisbursement
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/DisbursementID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveDisbursementResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Maintenance/{maintenanceId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Maintenance
      summary: RqBQ Request a maintenance activity for a consumer load
      description: RqBQ Request a maintenance activity for a consumer load
      operationId: RequestMaintenance
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/MaintenanceID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/RequestMaintenanceRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestMaintenanceResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Maintenance/{maintenanceId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Maintenance
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about maintenance processing for a loan
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about maintenance processing for a loan
      operationId: RetrieveMaintenance
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/MaintenanceID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveMaintenanceResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Withdrawal/{withdrawalId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Withdrawal
      summary: UpBQ Update details of a withdrawal from a loan
      description: UpBQ Update details of a withdrawal from a loan
      operationId: UpdateWithdrawal
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/WithdrawalID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Withdrawal'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Withdrawal'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Withdrawal/{withdrawalId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Withdrawal
      summary: ExBQ Execute an automated withdrawal against a loan
      description: ExBQ Execute an automated withdrawal against a loan
      operationId: ExecuteWithdrawal
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/WithdrawalID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Withdrawal'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExecuteWithdrawalResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Withdrawal/{withdrawalId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Withdrawal
      summary: RqBQ Request handling of a withdrawal
      description: RqBQ Request handling of a withdrawal
      operationId: RequestWithdrawal
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/WithdrawalID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Withdrawal'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestWithdrawalResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Withdrawal/{withdrawalId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Withdrawal
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan withdrawal
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan withdrawal
      operationId: RetrieveWithdrawal
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/WithdrawalID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveWithdrawalResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Repayment/{repaymentId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Repayment
      summary: UpBQ Update a repayment transaction made to the loan
      description: UpBQ Update a repayment transaction made to the loan
      operationId: UpdateRepayment
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RepaymentID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateRepaymentRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateRepaymentResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Repayment/{repaymentId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Repayment
      summary: ExBQ Execute an automated repayment transaction
      description: ExBQ Execute an automated repayment transaction
      operationId: ExecuteRepayment
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RepaymentID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Repayment'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExecuteRepaymentResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Repayment/{repaymentId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Repayment
      summary: RqBQ Request handling of an exceptional repayment
      description: RqBQ Request handling of an exceptional repayment
      operationId: RequestRepayment
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RepaymentID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/Repayment'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestRepaymentResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Repayment/{repaymentId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Repayment
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan repayment
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan repayment
      operationId: RetrieveRepayment
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RepaymentID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveRepaymentResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Restructuring/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - BQ - Restructuring
      summary: InBQ Initiate loan account restructuring
      description: InBQ Initiate loan account restructuring
      operationId: InitiateRestructuring
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateRestructuringRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateRestructuringResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Restructuring/{restructuringId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Restructuring
      summary: UpBQ Update details of a loan or restructuring activities
      description: UpBQ Update details of a loan or restructuring activities
      operationId: UpdateRestructuring
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RestructuringID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateRestructuringRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateRestructuringResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Restructuring/{restructuringId}/Request:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Restructuring
      summary: RqBQ Request activity associated with a restructuring effort
      description: RqBQ Request activity associated with a restructuring effort
      operationId: RequestRestructuring
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RestructuringID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/RequestRestructuringRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restructuring'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Loan/{loanId}/Restructuring/{restructuringId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - Restructuring
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan restructuring task
      description: ReBQ Retrieve details about a loan restructuring task
      operationId: RetrieveRestructuring
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/LoanID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/RestructuringID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveRestructuringResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    LoanFacility:
      type: object
      properties:
        ProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        LoanNumber:
          type: string
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        PartyReference:
          type: object
        CustomerAgreementReference:
          type: object
        CustomerCreditAssessmentReference:
          type: object
        InsuranceReference:
          type: object
        DelinquencyOrCollectionReference:
          type: object
        BankBranchOrLocationReference:
          type: object
        BankAccountingUnitReference:
          type: object
        LoanType:
          type: string
        LoanAmount:
          type: number
        LoanCurrency:
          type: string
        LoanRateType:
          type: string
        LoanApplicableRate:
          type: object
        RepaymentType:
          type: string
        InterestType:
          type: string
        InterestAccrualMethod:
          type: string
        LoanOriginationDate:
          type: string
        LoanMaturityDate:
          type: string
        CollateralReference:
          type: object
        CollateralAllocation:
          type: string
        TaxReference:
          type: object
        LoanAccessTerms:
          type: string
        EntitlementOptionDefinition:
          type: string
        EntitlementOptionSetting:
          type: string
        RestrictionOptionDefinition:
          type: string
        RestrictionOptionSetting:
          type: string
        Associations:
          type: string
        AssociationType:
          type: string
        AssociationObligationOrEntitlement:
          type: string
        AssociationReference:
          type: object
        LoanRepaymentSchedule:
          type: string
        StagedRepaymentStatement:
          type: string
        CustomerCommentary:
          type: string
        LoanOutstandingBalance:
          type: string
        DateType:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
    Repayment:
      type: object
      properties:
        RepaymentTransactionType:
          type: string
        RepaymentTransactionPayerReference:
          type: object
        RepaymentTransactionPayerProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        RepaymentTransactionPayerBankReference:
          type: object
        RepaymentTransactionAmount:
          type: number
        RepaymentTransactionCurrency:
          type: string
        RepaymentTransactionValueDate:
          type: string
    Restructuring:
      type: object
      properties:
        RestructuringTask:
          type: string
        RestructuringEvaluation:
          type: string
        RestructuringWriteDown:
          type: string
    Disbursement:
      type: object
      properties:
        DisbursementPayeeReference:
          type: object
        DisbursementPayeeProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        DisbursementPayeeBankReference:
          type: object
        DisbursementAmount:
          type: number
        DisbursementCurrency:
          type: string
        DisbursementValueDate:
          type: string
    ServiceFees:
      type: object
      properties:
        FeeConfigurationProfile:
          type: string
        FeeType:
          type: string
        FeeDefinition:
          type: string
        FeeApplicationRecord:
          type: string
        FeeTransaction:
          type: string
        TransactionDescription:
          type: string
        TransactionFeeType:
          type: string
        TransactionFeeCharge:
          type: string
        FeeProjectionsandCommitments:
          type: string
        ProjectedTransactionDescription:
          type: string
        ProjectedTransactionFeeType:
          type: string
        ProjectedTransactionFeeCharge:
          type: string
        FeeAccrualAmount:
          type: number
        AccrualFeeType:
          type: string
        AccrualFeeCharge:
          type: string
    Interest:
      type: object
      properties:
        InterestRateType:
          type: string
        InterestRateApplicationSchedule:
          type: object
        InterestRateConfiguration:
          type: object
        InterestRate:
          type: object
        InterestApplicationRecord:
          type: string
        InterestTransaction:
          type: string
        TransactionDescription:
          type: string
        TransactionRateType:
          type: string
        TransactionInterestCharge:
          type: string
        InterestAccrualAmount:
          type: number
        InterestAccrualType:
          type: string
        InterestAccrualCharge:
          type: string
    Withdrawal:
      type: object
      properties:
        PaymentTransaction:
          type: string
        PaymentTransactionType:
          type: string
        PaymentTransactionPayeeReference:
          type: object
        PaymentTransactionPayeeAccountReference:
